solution_line_template: We look first for the total number of books that were sold: {books_sold_monday} + {books_sold_tuesday} + {books_sold_wednesday} + {books_sold_thursday} + {books_sold_friday} = <<{books_sold_monday}+{books_sold_tuesday}+{books_sold_wednesday}+{books_sold_thursday}+{books_sold_friday}={total_books_sold}>>{total_books_sold} books.
So the total number of books that were not sold is: {initial_stock_books} - {total_books_sold} = <<{initial_stock_books}-{total_books_sold}={books_not_sold}>>{books_not_sold} books.
